name: Zombies 2D
description:
Press <ENTER> on your keyboard to start.

This is a simple 2D sidescroller I did in my free time, and it is the first game I have ever made. I like zombies, I love games, so I thought: why not creating my own zombies game?

I did everything you can see: programming, pixel art, animation, music, sound effect, concept.

If you want to learn more about what I do in my free time, check out my personal website
